name: Cult Initiation Simulator
description:
Hello, and welcome to Cult Initiation Simulator (my first ever game)! 

This is a (very) short point & click adventure inspired by Pythar, classic '90s adventure games, and coffee, made for Pridetharian Jam 21. Assume the role of the confused protagonist, as they try to remember what they were doing before waking up in a strange place. For the most complete experience, look at things before interacting with them! Or don't. I'm not your supervisor.

See the readme for the (very) basic controls! There's a text version and a fancy PDF version, for reasons.

Credits:

Made for the Pridetharian Jam 2021

Inspired by Pythar (twitch.tv/pythar)

Pythar's Dilbert emote by Kane (twitch.tv/KaneOnMain)

Rain SFX from Freesound.org (CC0 Licensed)

Made in Adventure Game Studio (AGS)

All art (excepting Dilbert) made by Chris Sirgey, with Canva Pro and GIMP

"Story", programming, music, and other junk by Chris Sirgey
